name: The Melrose Coffee Table
description: With its bold lines and striking angles, the Melrose coffee table is a stylish centrepiece that brings modern-day glamour to a smart living room while retaining timeless elegance. Clean, bold lines of sycamore contrasting against a stylish shade of high-gloss cream lacquer, this statement design conveys a confident, distinctly contemporary aesthetic. Supported by two slab legs and a platform, the form of the Melrose exudes simplicity and grace for an innovative take on essential living room furniture, perfect for presenting your favourite coffee table books and magazines.
